item.title: Day 0 with Kivy Pi
item.description: Starting Fresh After years of neglect, it is time to revive this website. Instead of making promises about the future, let’s jump right in with some Raspberry Pi! I’ve been using Pi since the version 1 days and still can’t believe how capable the hardware is. With such an awesome community of developers and makers, just about anything you think of can be done with a Pi. I have the official 7" touchscreen integrated into a Cana case which I find extremely convenient.
